colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI DAD LAN PAD TSAL DRUNG @007B YIG BSOD NAMS RAB BRTAN GYIS BLA MA DANG RJE BTZUN SGROL MA DBYER MED DU BYAS TE GDUNG SHUGS DRAG POS GSOL BA 'DEBS PA'I TSUL LAM GYI LUS YONGS SU RDZOGS PA'I SMON TSIG DANG BYAS PA ZHIG DGOS ZHES NAN CHEN POS BSKUL BA LA RTEN NAS, DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BKRA SHIS BSAM GTAN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG 'GRO KUN BSHES GNYEN DAM PAS RJES SU 'DZIN PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
